parameters.subscriptionRequest/filterexpression: statuscode eq 2 or statuscode eq 445260005 or statuscode eq 445260006 or statuscode eq 445260003 or statuscode eq 445260011

When_Programme_is_set_to_an_inactive_sta.description: inactive, Rejected, Awaiting Approval, Awaiting Amendment Approval, Programme Closed, Programme Complete

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_projectcost">
    <attribute name="leidos_projectcostid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_costitem" />
    <order attribute="leidos_costitem" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentprogramme" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_programmeid']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_projectfunding">
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="leidos_projectfundingid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_programme" operator="eq"  value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_programmeid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_anticipatedspendprofile">
    <attribute name="leidos_parentproject" />
    <attribute name="leidos_spendprofilereference" />
    <attribute name="leidos_anticipatedspendprofileid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_parentproject" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentprogramme" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_programmeid']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_projectmeasure">
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="leidos_projectmeasureid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_programme" operator="eq"  value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_programmeid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_projectstrategicpriority">
    <attribute name="leidos_projectstrategicpriorityid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="leidos_parentproject" />
    <attribute name="leidos_strategicpriority" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentprogramme" operator="eq"  value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_programmeid']}" />
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_recovery">
    <attribute name="leidos_recoveryid" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="ne" value="2" />
    </filter>
    <link-entity name="leidos_projectfunding" from="leidos_projectfundingid" to="leidos_parentfunding" link-type="inner" alias="aj">
      <link-entity name="leidos_programme" from="leidos_programmeid" to="leidos_programme" link-type="inner" alias="ak">
        <filter type="and">
          <condition attribute="leidos_programmeid" operator="eq"  value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_programmeid']}" />
        </filter>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>
